menu_options.safety_alert: Safety Alert (Ministry of the Interior and Safety)

safety_alert.title: Safety Alert Setup - Select Province/City
safety_alert.description: Select the province or city to receive safety alerts.

safety_alert_sgg.title: Safety Alert Setup - Select District
safety_alert_sgg.description: Select the district to receive safety alerts. Check 'Add Sub-district' if you want to specify down to the sub-district level.

safety_alert_emd.title: Safety Alert Setup - Select Sub-district
safety_alert_emd.description: Select the sub-district to receive safety alerts.

kakaomap.title: KakaoMap Configuration
kakaomap.description: Set start and end locations to get traffic information.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the server. ({error})
error.no_sgg_available: No districts available for the selected province/city.
error.no_emd_available: No sub-districts available for the selected district.
